name: SNFY – Scraped News From YCombinator.com
author: markbaa

sections.description: This is a plugin developed for the newest feed from YCombinator News which has no RSS feed. It’s very gentle and doesn’t hit the server too often. Always be polite to others. Bit of a YCNews junkie, and annoyed I couldn’t get a feed on (my site) so built this.
sections.faq: It’s a polite plugin. Caches the scraping and doesn’t hit YCombinator too often.
